sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import {
    Container,
    Paper,
    Typography,
    Grid,
    TextField,
    Button,
    List,
    ListItem,
    ListItemText,
    IconButton,
    Box,
    Chip,
} from '@mui/material';
import DeleteIcon from '@mui/icons-material/Delete';
import './App.css';

function App() {
    // ... (other code remains the same)

    return (
        <Container maxWidth="md">
            <Paper elevation={3} className="paper">
                <Typography variant="h4" gutterBottom className="heading">
                    Personalized Email Outreach
                </Typography>
                <TextField
                    id="prompt"
                    label="Enter Your Prompt"
                    variant="outlined"
                    fullWidth
                    multiline
                    rows={4}
                    value={prompt}
                    onChange={(e) => setPrompt(e.target.value)}
                    className="prompt-input"
                />
                <Grid container spacing={2} alignItems="center" className="recipient-grid">
                    <Grid item xs={8}>
                        <TextField
                            id="newRecipient"
                            label="Add Recipient"
                            variant="outlined"
                            fullWidth
                            value={newRecipient}
                            onChange={(e) => setNewRecipient(e.target.value)}
                            className="recipient-input"
                        />
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item xs={4}>
                        <Button
                            variant="contained"
                            color="primary"
                            onClick={addRecipient}
                            fullWidth
                            className="add-button"
                        >
                            Add Recipient
                        </Button>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
                {recipientNames.length > 0 && (
                    <List className="recipient-list">
                        {recipientNames.map((name, index) => (
                            <ListItem key={index} className="recipient-item">
                                <Chip
                                    label={name}
                                    onDelete={() => removeRecipient(index)}
                                    color="primary"
                                    className="recipient-chip"
                                />
                            </ListItem>
                        ))}
                    </List>
                )}
                <Button
                    variant="contained"
                    color="primary"
                    onClick={generateEmail}
                    fullWidth
                    className="generate-button"
                >
                    Generate Email
                </Button>
                <Box mt={2} className="generated-email-box">
                    <Typography variant="h6" className="generated-email-heading">Generated Email:</Typography>
                    <Typography variant="body1" className="generated-email-content">{generatedEmail}</Typography>
                </Box>
            </Paper>
        </Container>
    );
}

export default App;
